title: Login Screen Is Blank
body: When I try to play league it only gives me a blank screen I've restarted my computer and even uninstalled league then reinstalled it to see if the problem was fixed but it isn't only showing me a blank screen. (http://)Maybe its because my computer that is old. (Windows 7 computer that has been updated to 8 had gotten this computer in 2009) Any help guys?{{item:3070}}

replies.body: It could just be something within your network that is preventing you from getting a good connection with our servers. Without a solid connection, the client won't know what splash art it needs to display, and can sometimes default to showing nothing but a black background. Check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for any updates you could make, and let me know if that helps!
